general_advisory: Farmers are advised to grow short duration Rabi crops like Green gram, Black gram, Cowpea, Field pea, Lentil, Groundnut, Tori in medium/shallow lowlands utilizing the available soil moisture in the field. Proper field surveillance for pests. and diseases regularly and take appropriate plant protection measures accordingly.

advisory: Harvest rice crops which have reached 85% maturity of the panicle and looks pale yellow in colour. After threshing, paddy grains need to be sun-dried to 14% moisture for consumption purposes and for seed purposes, it should be dried to 12% moisture for better self-life.

Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19 and PU 30 for black gram and K 851, PDM 11, PDM 54, OUM 115 for green gram. Use 10 kg seeds/acre. Before sowing, seeds are to be treated with the rhizobium culture.

Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19 and PU 30 for black gram and K 851, PDM 11, PDM 54, OUM 115 for green gram. Use 10 kg seeds/acre. Before sowing, seeds are to be treated with the rhizobium culture.

Use the groundnut varieties suitable to Odisha conditions like Kalinga groundnut 101, Devi, 37A, TAG-51, TAG-38, TAG-24, Smruti, CO-7, Dharani etc. For one acre 40-50 kg groundnut seed kernel is required.

To manage wilt and rot disease in Brinjal and Tomato, drench the root zone with a solution of Plantomycin and 20-gram (Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64 % WP) or 10 ml Tebuconazole mixed in 10 litres of water.

To manage wilt and rot disease in Brinjal and Tomato, drench the root zone with a solution of Plantomycin and 20-gram (Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64 % WP) or 10 ml Tebuconazole mixed in 10 litres of water.

To manage thrips infestation install Blue sticky trap @ 8 nos./acre. For chemical control spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 0.4 g/lit or Fipronil 5% SC @ 2ml/lit or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL 0.35 ml/lit of water.

To manage Red Spider Mites in flower like Marigold and rose spray wettable sulphur 80 % WP (Sulfex/Balwan/Sulfadex) @ 2-gram/litre of water or Propargite 57 % EC (Omite/Mitekill/Super Dynamite) @ 2 ml/litre of water or Fenpyroximate 5 % EC (Seagate/Mitigate/Formite) @ 2 ml/litre of water.

To manage Red Spider Mites in flower like Marigold and rose spray wettable sulphur 80 % WP (Sulfex/Balwan/Sulfadex) @ 2-gram/litre of water or Propargite 57 % EC (Omite/Mitekill/Super Dynamite) @ 2 ml/litre of water or Fenpyroximate 5 % EC (Seagate/Mitigate/Formite) @ 2 ml/litre of water.

During winters, various fungal, bacterial and parasitic diseases may appear in the fish. Treat the pond with CIFAX @ 1-2 kg/acre or limestone @ 50-100 kg/acre. Salt application @ 100 kg/acre also helps in protecting fish against disease outbreak during winters.
